snippet: The Manhattan district attorney’s office said Wednesday that it would not begin prosecuting a suspect in a violent confrontation between a group of motorcyclists and the driver of an S.U.V.
abstract: Manhattan district attorney's office will not prosecute Allen Edwards, one of two suspects arrested after confrontation between group of motorcyclists and driver of SUV on West Side of Manhattan, concerned that arrest was hasty and that low-level charges could jeopardize larger case against men involved

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and RUSS BUETTNER

lead_paragraph: The Manhattan district attorney’s office said Wednesday that it would not begin prosecuting a suspect in a violent confrontation between a group of motorcyclists and the driver of an S.U.V.

headline.main: Prosecutor Isn’t Pursuing Charges Against One Biker Arrested in S.U.V. Case
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Isn’t Pursuing Charges Against One of Two Bikers Arrested in S.U.V. Case
